Name: DreamCell: Lost in Nightmares
About the game: DreamCell : Lost in Nightmares is a randomly generated action with rogue-like elements. Conquer your nightmares and find a way out of your dark dreams! =========================================== What is DreamCell: Lost in Nightmares? It is an indie action game with rogue-like elements where you are stuck inside your nightmares and have to find your way out of it. But will you make it or you will be dragged into the nightmares and be stuck there forever? =========================================== Key Features: Randomly generated rooms, weapons, items and enemies 4 Different modes - Single Player, Local Co-Op, Speed-Run, Infinite Mode Controller Support In-game Achievements Unlockable Weapons and Characters Over 60+ Collectible Items Over 50+ Enemy Types Boss Fights Combine Different Weapons Character Customization Conquer nightmare monsters, find a way out and travel deeper into dark dreams You never play the same game twice! Controller is required for local multiplayer.
